title: Sell BTAC
metaTitle: Sell Buffalo Trace Antique Collection | Proof Cellars
metaDescription: Sell your BTAC bourbon to Proof Cellars. We buy George T. Stagg, Sazerac 18, Eagle Rare 17, Handy, and Weller. Direct offers.
heroHeadline: Sell Your Buffalo Trace Antique Collection
heroSubhead: We buy all BTAC releases directly - no consignment, no auctions.
introParagraph: The Buffalo Trace Antique Collection represents some of the most sought-after American whiskeys released each year. We buy all five BTAC expressions directly: George T. Stagg, William Larue Weller, Thomas H. Handy, Eagle Rare 17, and Sazerac 18. Submit photos and details to receive an offer.
whatWeBuy: Thomas H. Handy Sazerac Rye (all release years)
Older BTAC releases with vintage packaging
whatWeDoNotBuy: Items we cannot legally purchase in your state
photoChecklist: Front label showing expression and proof
Back label with release year information
Fill level visible against a light source
Original tube or box if available
conditionFactors: Fill level must be at or near original - BTAC bottles should show minimal evaporation
Seal integrity is critical - any signs of tampering or opening disqualify bottles
Label condition matters - proof and release year should be clearly visible
Original tubes add value when present
Release year affects demand - some years are more sought after
Storage conditions matter - properly stored bottles retain better value
pricingFactors: Presence of original tube or box
Current market demand for that year's release
Overall collection completeness if selling multiple

faqs.question: Which BTAC expressions do you buy?
faqs.answer: We buy all five BTAC releases: George T. Stagg, William Larue Weller, Thomas H. Handy, Eagle Rare 17 Year, and Sazerac 18 Year from any release year.

faqs.question: Do some BTAC release years have more value?
faqs.answer: Yes. Demand varies by release year and expression. Some years with exceptional reviews or unusual proofs command higher prices. We evaluate each bottle individually.

faqs.question: Does the tube add value?
faqs.answer: Yes. Original BTAC tubes add value. Include photos of the tube if you have it.

faqs.question: How do I identify my BTAC release year?
faqs.answer: The release year is typically indicated on the back label. The proof varies each year for most expressions, which also helps identify the vintage.

faqs.question: Can I sell a complete BTAC set?
faqs.answer: Yes. We buy complete annual sets as well as individual bottles. For complete sets, provide photos of all five bottles.

faqs.question: How quickly will I receive an offer?
faqs.answer: We typically respond within one business day for BTAC submissions. These bottles are in high demand.

faqs.question: What if I have older BTAC bottles?
faqs.answer: Older BTAC releases, especially from the early years of the collection, are often collectible. Send photos and we will evaluate based on age, condition, and current demand.

faqs.question: Do you verify authenticity?
faqs.answer: Yes. We review photos for authenticity indicators and conduct full verification during physical inspection. BTAC bottles are carefully examined.
